Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameZone.marbles

Class Marble

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameZone.marbles.Marble
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueMarble, GreyMarble, PurpleMarble, RedMarble, WhiteMarble, YellowMarble
public abstract class Marble
extends java.lang.Object
Marble is the class for marbles in the resources market

  • Constructor Details

    • Marble

      public Marble​(MarbleColour colour) throws InvalidMarbleColourException
      The constructor initializes colour to a given colour
      Parameters:
      colour - The colour of this marble
      Throws:
      InvalidMarbleColourException

  • Method Details

    • collect

      public abstract ObtainableResourceSet collect​(Board board) throws InvalidBoardException
      collect returns an ObtainableResourceSet representing the resources obtained by collecting this Marble
      Parameters:
      board - The Board of the player collecting this Marble (this is used for applying ConversionEffects)
      Returns:
      An ObtainableResourceSet with at most one resource or faith point representing the resources obtained by collecting this Marble
      Throws:
      InvalidBoardException - board is null

    • getColour

      public MarbleColour getColour()
      getColour returns the colour of this Marble
      Returns:
      The MarbleColour of this Marble
